title: andi vELai azhagu
sahitya:
andi vELai azhagu konjudE en Atma nAthan kAdal minjudE sakhiyE


anupallavi

  sundara maNi pUNDa sOmasundarEshan mandahAsan


caraNam    saLLaiyEsam sArak-kaDalenrEn upa shAntamAna kAntan ennai
muLLai viTTu malarai muhar enrAn anda malarinuLLE
kaLLi uNNum vaNDu pOlak-kaDavuL anbaik-karudi karudi
aLLik-kalakkum vAzhvE paramAnandam anantam enrAn
